summary.title: Summary
summary.content: Dynamic and creative software developer. Eager to learn new technologies on a team. Now I am studying software developer engineering at ITESO. Looking to land my first job as tester or backend engineer to pursue my long term goal of becoming a full stack developer. My post graduation goal is to become a DevOps developer and I would like to undertake an internship position that advances that goal.

projects.name: Indievelopers
projects.title: WORDLE
projects.description: A guessing game using Python, where the user has to guess the N dimension word.
details: Gained experience in program testing using Pytex, problem solving, backend programming, and Python requests.

projects.name: ITESO
projects.title: CLASSiFiCATiON API
projects.description: A program that receives a list of points in a k dimensional space, and a new point to be added to the list.
details: Gained experience in API, classes, objects and collections.
Had a teamwork experience, having a different task each one.
Participated in the making of exceptions, and a function to use the Euclidean distance for the classification of the objects.

projects.name: ITESO
projects.title: TiC‑TAC‑TOE
projects.description: A Tic‑tac‑toe game using a 8051 micro chip and assembly language.
details: Gained experience in using assembly language, learned about the hardware inside a 8051 micro chip.
